abstract: Taking stock of one's life: things done well, things done less well.
snippet: Taking stock of one's life: things done well, things done less well.
lead_paragraph: Last week my colleague David Brooks made a request I couldn't refuse. He asked people over 70 to "write a brief report on your life so far, an evaluation of what you did well, of what you did not do well and what you learned along the way." Well, here I am, reporting in.
